channel.title: Comments on: Randomness. CHARLES SEIFE
channel.description: Exegesis Hermeneutics Flux Capacitor of Truthiness

item.title: By: alisonfletch
item.dc:creator: alisonfletch
item.description: Interesting. I guess as citizens we can weigh the odds in our favour by trying to get the politicians most likely to represent our views. Although no doubt our views are largely determined by our up bringing
item.content:encoded: Interesting. I guess as citizens we can weigh the odds in our favour by trying to get the politicians most likely to represent our views. Although no doubt our views are largely determined by our up bringing
